title: Kiss Me with Unspoken Love
overview: Bert meets Ken at a bar, and their one-night stand turns into something much more complicated. When Bert discovers that Ken, who tutors him, is not only his part-time professor but also his aunt's husband, old family wounds surface. Driven by resentment, Bert tries to seduce Ke as a form of revenge. However, Ken's unexpected love for Bert changes everything.
